name: Brown Butter Frosting
author: blueyedfeather
summary: Brown butter frosting is an 'old' recipe that is not commonly used anymore; however it is delicious. It is easy to make as long as you are careful to not burn the butter. This frosting is great on top of brownies.
ingredients: 2 tablespoons milk, or more as needed
directions: Heat butter, stirring constantly, in a saucepan over medium-low heat until it browns and becomes very aromatic, 5 to 10 minutes
Whisk confectioners' sugar into butter until dissolved and remove saucepan from heat; stir in milk and vanilla extract
Beat butter mixture using an electric mixer until frosting is smooth; add more milk if frosting is too thick
